alert.note: Alert for Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 11:59PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Washington Parish in southeastern Louisiana and northern Pearl River Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1158 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Varnado, or 8 miles north of Bogalusa, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bogalusa, Poplarville, Varnado and Angie. This includes Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 29 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
